Joe should have given him at least another 15 mins today and no point blooding a 10 when doing nothing re a reserve 9. Two minutes for Marmion a joke

@Cumoski Carberry’s not ready? No shit Sherlock after 2 losing starts for @leinsterrugby & part of a game v Fiji. He won’t be ready just by playing 4 @Munsterrugby either. Needs to start another test for @IrishRugby on this tour & at least 1 in each of the AIs & #6N #AUSvIRE

@patmccarry Was certainly not a 6. A liability in possession. His inept carries and Sexton’s missed touch were turning points. Your markings very harsh considering it was such a well contested high quality game- IMHO of course!
@patmccarry very, very harsh with your 5.5 scores for The two Robs and Aki gets a 4 from me
@RobOHanrahan You haven’t been in quite a while so
@patmccarry Worse again, he liked like he cannot distribute and make decisions in the wide channels
@SH4MEEE Bernard Foley is a great Australian name 🤣
@patmccarry Pass to Folau for that try was forward. Bundee Aki was pedestrian out there
Stockdale wrongly penalized. The ruck was over #AUSvIRE
@offtheball The pass to Folau was forward too
Bundee Aki is LOST IN SPACE 🙄 #AUSvIRE
FORWARD PASS TO FOLAU FKR THE TRY! #AUSvIRE
@LenihanDonal It should read Athy RFC
@LenihanDonal Grow your own Donal

@WorldRugby …Sealing off. Not supporting own weight at rucks. Most rules no longer applied

@WorldRugby Rules no longer/selectively applied in #rugby…Why? Last foot. Behind kicker @ kick-off/drop-out (see Castres 10). In from side. Driving off feet. Rolling away from ball at breakdown. Double movement on ground. Forward pass. #Free4All #U20WorldChampionships

@eoghancorry please follow back for a DM. Thank you.
@travelgenio You are selling flights that passengers cannot take and you do not care unless the passenger pays you more money.
@travelgenio You are selling flights that passengers cannot take and you do not care unless the passenger pays you more money.

@travelgenio Look at the @AerLingus reply above. They admit that the booking made by you, on their system with both flights having the same “EI” AerLingus booking code does not leave enough time between LHR @ LGW but u still want to charge penalties? @aviationreg @CCPCIreland @eoghancorry

@travelgenio Look at the @AerLingus reply above. They admit that the booking made by you, on their system with both flights having the same AerLingus booking code does not leave enough time between LHR @ LGW but u still want to charge penalties? @aviationreg @CCPCIreland

@AerLingus @travelgenio @aviationreg @CCPCIreland I am not asking you to delay a flight. I am asking @WestJet to keep his seat from Gatwick to Vancouver if he does not board the Dublin-Heathrow leg of flight.

@AerLingus Thank you 4 admitting there is not enough time 2 get 2 Gatwick. The 3rd party @Travelgenio say they were allowed book flight on your booking system & that flight was plotted on your system & say that you only allow changes with PENALTIES of €200-€300 @aviationreg @CCPCIreland

@WestJet my son was sold a €467 1 way/2 flight tkt landing @ Heathrow only 50mins before check-in @ Gatwick (38 miles away) this Friday. Will you hold his seat to Vancouver open if he doesn't take @AerLingus flight but comes to your check-in on time at Gatwick? #HaveA❤️ 🍁☘️
